message:
Hi Stephen,

Need a small clarification on "configureawait(false)"! in your example, what will happen if the call(IndexAsync) in controller class(MandelbrotController) is refactored to "CalculateMandelbrotAsync().configureawait(false)". Would this put incoming request and corresponding response out-of-sync, like if we have 3 parallel calls to the controller Request-1, Request-2, Request-3 and if all these calls are handled via configureawait(false) hint, is there a chance that response of Request-2 getting to either Request-1/3?

We are working on fine-tuning webapi deployed on azure to improve total number of requests served by webapi and also response time to serve one request.

Appreciate your help   
--Prasad
